tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids I'm sorry but to hell with ' voluntary ' grow a pair and use your enforcement powers! You're about as much use as a toothless tiger!  Clearly the tail is wagging the dog in your 'relationship' with Red! We the residents have had enough.... NOW ACT and stop dithering! @Cap_it_off

@EnvAgencyMids Can't even hide in bed, it's in there, Bathroom it's in there, hallway is unbearable, kitchen it's there, living room it's there. Surprise me and do something, like your job, make our environment safe.
@EnvAgencyMids The Environment Agency is a joke there is no difference what so ever! in fact the last 48 hours have been worse than it has in months!

@EnvAgencyMids I’ve just come out of hospital after spending 9 days in there and the stink in my home is unbearable, I’m struggling to breathe and my throat is burning. When are you going to do your job and close the site
@EnvAgencyMids Jesus, you lot must be on some serious backhanders.
@EnvAgencyMids Not good enough!!

@EnvAgencyMids Judging from the odour in Hartshill (over 2 miles) away, Friday night, last night and all day today they have failed. Our children's school and our home has been full of the stench. #notgoodenough @envAgencyMids #stopthestink

@JulesBS3 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids Really bad tonight no wind so it’s going to linger all night right the way though till morning @EnvAgency @HouseofCommons @BorisJohnson @MattHancock @Sotlive @RedIndustries2

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids What a load of rubbish! Stinks worse than ever and they are still tipping 🤬
@a_merrydew @EnvAgencyMids Your right it has got worse, and tonight is going to be another sleepless night.

@EnvAgencyMids The odour has gotten worse since the capping took place. I didn't think it was possible for it to get worse but sadly I was wrong. I'm breathing in H2S while typing this tweet, as the noxious gas has pervaded my home again. More sleep deprivation & stress for many in NUL tonight.
@SimmoBurgess @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids I've just thought did they or did they not receive 1200 impact statements ? @SimonTagg , i'm sure I saw a pic of you sending them .
@SimmoBurgess @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids And it took 5 days to publish it .
@EnvAgencyMids Just a joke you are money pays once again
@EnvAgencyMids How much evidence do you want @ClareDinnisEA ? A death? Several? @JamesBevanEA @MattHancock @PHE_EoEngland @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

@EnvAgencyMids Pathetic, you are allowing our community to be poisoned. We will see you in court!

@JWillson1 @Lucy_Lapwing @LGSpace @Buzz_dont_tweet @DandelionAppre1 @Love_plants @wildflower_hour @WildFlowerSoc @BiodiversitySoS @MeadowInGarden @DaveGoulson @RewildingB @banburyfm @banburynews @Cherwellcouncil @TownEvents @EnvAgency I have concerns about this person's safety. tweets.text:
@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Amazing work @ChrisGPackham!
Please help us in our quest to stop @The_Blue_Cross  Lewknor being closed down for nothing more than a business decision.We’d love your opinion/help. Please help us! This is going to have a huge impact to the animals that Lewknor help. @savebxlewknor

Via the NEW Diglis fish pass, twaite shad can now swim past #Worcester on their #SevernShadRun for the first time in nearly 180yrs! 🎉🐟🎉 
Please watch & share our video! #FollowTheShad #FishMigration @CanalRiverTrust @severnrivers @EnvAgencyMids @HeritageFundM_E @LIFEprogramme https://t.co/kzh7NFPljc

@CRTNorthWest @Greenstreet @stormwater_jo @GroundworkCLM @River_Douglas_ @Mike_Forty @Bithells @WiganCouncil @Wingate_Wood @EnvAgencyNW @WigToday @VitaminSNC Big thanks to Diane Rollin and a very cheerful 😀 Chris Smart in your Team. They were a huge help and kept us all cheery and energised!

Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy
Photo from today. Capping still unfinished. @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Don't try to tell us they did it on time, we have eyes. https://t.co/6HwgiXw9hB

@ShaunLintern @EnvAgency Thank you for highlighting this health crisis. Please help us make sure this never happens to another community in the UK again by signing and sharing this petition for tighter regulation of landfills #stopthestink https://t.co/Lgsdqydotl

urls.title: The Chilterns AONB - News
urls.description: Buckinghamshire Council and the Chilterns Conservation Board have serious concerns about the impacts of HS2’s tunnelling operations on Buckinghamshire’s aquifer and chalk streams. These concerns relate to pollution resulting from tunnelling operations, increasing abstraction of water and impacts on the flow of significant chalk streams, such as the River Misbourne. A joint Position Statement has been issued with a series of questions regarding these concerns, and the Council and the Chilterns Conservation

tweets.text:
Here is a good statement reflecting our concerns with regard to HS2 Tunnelling and the impact on the chalk aquifer https://t.co/tUIdNMbtSW
It is with sadness we announce a very compliant @EnvAgency have approved the tunnelling without any public consultation.

@EnvAgencyYNE the warning sign has been removed and vandalised from this outfall. Found it during one of our litter picks. I'm afraid I can't report it to the phone number on it as it is no longer in service https://t.co/8ElfXJSgmK

⚠️PLEASE DO NOT BURN WASTE⚠️

Smoke from fires can easily spread into homes, especially when more windows are open due to nice weather, and seriously affects people who have respiratory problems.

Please respect the welfare of your neighbours and the wider community. https://t.co/e7mpm4ihME

Vegetation clearance starts from tomorrow. A very short visit this am incl: nest building Whitethroat, territorial Cetti's/Reed Warbler & Reed Bunting. Video shows how farcical this is! Still time to see sense @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder  PLEASE RETWEET https://t.co/Tve0B6o4va

urls.title: Activists fight to save 550-year-old oak threatened by new Shrewsbury road
urls.description: Objectors say relief road contradicts council’s net zero target and will damage local wildlife sites

tweets.text: @DouglasPilot @Greenstreet @CRTNorthWest @stormwater_jo @GroundworkCLM @River_Douglas_ @Mike_Forty @Bithells @WiganCouncil @Wingate_Wood @EnvAgencyNW @WigToday @VitaminSNC Great work.  Brilliant to see people working together to get the job done!  Glad we @GroundworkCLM were able to do our bit.  Where too next?

Close it, cap it, clean it. 
We will settle for nothing less. And this needs to start NOW - not being stalled for another year. Give me a biohazard suit & I’ll bring a spade myself @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency https://t.co/OzNy3CXg8f

tweets.text: @Beeron1030 @PJennings88 @EnvAgency The obligation is to provide evidence that the aquifer isn't under threat, not the other way around. If everything is fine why doesn't HS2 and the EA share their evidence and why has Affinity Water been granted a multimillion indemnity to protect its revenues in case of damage?

@PJennings88 @EnvAgency A "good statement" that contains not a single shred of evidence the chalk aquifer is under threat.
How many times do you expect to cry wolf?

Today our River @GreenStreet #wigan is clear of years of plastic waste after top team work & £ donations. TEAM DOUGLAS are the fab @CRTNorthWest @stormwater_jo @GroundworkCLM @River_Douglas_ @Mike_Forty @Bithells @WiganCouncil @Wingate_Wood @EnvAgencyNW + RAM Safety RT @WigToday https://t.co/y3tXJEsYV0

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Social media works, it's very nice when people work together to solve problems like this, this proves that point, 
Ask nicely & logical thinking people 🤔 talk & come to a amicable arrangement 
Problem solved 👏👏👏👏
Thanks Chris your great yet again 👍 👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏🙏

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Great news Chris - thank you as always. Shame #HS2 didn’t show some reason & compromise before destroying this mass of bramble on Wormwood Scrubs a few weeks back. Heartbreaking. urls.title: Start of the close season: How do we protect our breeding fish at this time of year?
urls.description: Matt Buck, Fisheries Technical Specialist for the Midlands, explains how close season helps protect our breeding fish. Well the evenings are getting lighter, and across the country fish are starting to move out of their winter haunts - a sure …

tweets.text:
The coarse fish close season has started. This means it’s illegal to fish for coarse fish in rivers until 15th June inclusive.  

Don’t forget, there are plenty of still waters or canal coarse fisheries where you can fish. 

Learn more: https://t.co/u6IhTpkgUB https://t.co/ujbBmr7aUX

tweets.text:
A joint statement from @ChilternsAONB & @BucksCouncil
on the potential damage - beyond the obvious- caused by boring massive holes in a fractured chalk geology.

urls.title: Is the Environment Agency doing its job?
urls.description: Guy Linley-Adams, Solicitor to Salmon & Trout Conservation, shares the findings from their new report on the role of the Environment Agency & why greater investment is needed to make our rivers, lakes, and streams healthy by 2027.

tweets.text: Is the Environment Agency doing its job? via @wcl_news https://t.co/Jv8p9Je01t @EnvAgency

#thursdaymorning without stink wind blowing away from me looking at wind direction I should be ok tell tomorrow, we shouldn’t have to plan our day by where the wind blows #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency just close it down I’m not getting it but someone else is
@GMeout @StinkStopthe Very concerning, @EnvAgency need to address how this was able to happen.
